verses.text: Now when the \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w* \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;\f + \fr 4.1 \ft the children…: Heb. the sons of the transportation\f*

Then they \w came|strong="H5066"\w* to \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, and to the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Let us \w build|strong="H1129"\w* with you: for we \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as ye \add do;\add* and we do \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto him since the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Esar-haddon|strong="H0634"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assur|strong="H0804"\w*, which brought us up \w hither|strong="H5927"\w*.

But \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, and \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye have nothing to do with us to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; but we ourselves \w together|strong="H3162"\w* will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* us.

Then the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w weakened|strong="H7503"\w* the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w* them in \w building|strong="H1129"\w*,

And \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* against them, to \w frustrate|strong="H6565"\w* their \w purpose|strong="H6098"\w*, all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, even until the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*.

And in the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, in the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4438"\w*, \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* they \add unto him\add* an \w accusation|strong="H7855"\w* against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 4.6 \ft Ahasuerus: Heb. Ahashverosh\f*

¶ And in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w Bishlam|strong="H1312"\w*, \w Mithredath|strong="H4990"\w*, \w Tabeel|strong="H2870"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of their \w companions|strong="H3674"\w*, unto \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*; and the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* of the \w letter|strong="H5406"\w* \add was\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the Syrian \w tongue|strong="H0762"\w*, and \w interpreted|strong="H8638"\w* in the Syrian \w tongue|strong="H0762"\w*.\f + \fr 4.7 \ft Bishlam: or, in peace\f*\f + \fr 4.7 \ft companions: Heb. societies\f*

\w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w* the \w chancellor|strong="H1169"\w* and \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* \w a|strong="H2298"\w* \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* to \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* in this \w sort|strong="H3660"\w*:\f + \fr 4.8 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \add wrote\add* \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w* the \w chancellor|strong="H1169"\w*, and \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* of their \w companions|strong="H3675"\w*; the \w Dinaites|strong="H1784"\w*, the \w Apharsathchites|strong="H0671"\w*, the \w Tarpelites|strong="H2967"\w*, the \w Apharsites|strong="H0670"\w*, the \w Archevites|strong="H0756"\w*, the \w Babylonians|strong="H0896"\w*, the \w Susanchites|strong="H7801"\w*, the \w Dehavites|strong="H1723"\w*, \add and\add* the \w Elamites|strong="H5962"\w*,\f + \fr 4.9 \ft companions: Chaldee, societies\f*

And the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H0524"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* the \w great|strong="H7229"\w* and \w noble|strong="H3358"\w* \w Asnappar|strong="H0620"\w* brought \w over|strong="H1541"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3488"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H7149"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8115"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \add that are\add* on this \w side|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, and at such a \w time|strong="H3706"\w*.\f + \fr 4.10 \ft at such…: Chaldee, Cheeneth\f*

¶ \w This|strong="H1836"\w* \add is\add* the \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* of the \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* they \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* unto \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*; Thy \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* the \w men|strong="H0606"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, and at such a \w time|strong="H3706"\w*.

Be \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, that the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* came \w up|strong="H5559"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w thee|strong="H3890"\w* to \w us|strong="H5922"\w* are \w come|strong="H0858"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w building|strong="H1124"\w* the \w rebellious|strong="H4779"\w* and the \w bad|strong="H0873"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w*, and have set \w up|strong="H3635"\w* the \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* \add thereof\add*, and \w joined|strong="H2338"\w* the \w foundations|strong="H0787"\w*.\f + \fr 4.12 \ft set up: or, finished\f*\f + \fr 4.12 \ft joined: Chaldee, sewed together\f*

Be it \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, that, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* be \w builded|strong="H1124"\w*, and the \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* set \w up|strong="H3635"\w* \add again, then\add* will they \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w pay|strong="H5415"\w* \w toll|strong="H4061"\w*, \w tribute|strong="H1093"\w*, and \w custom|strong="H1983"\w*, and \add so\add* thou shalt \w endamage|strong="H5142"\w* the \w revenue|strong="H0674"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*.\f + \fr 4.13 \ft pay: Chaldee, give\f*\f + \fr 4.13 \ft revenue: or, strength\f*

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w because|strong="H6903"\w* we \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w maintenance|strong="H4415"\w* from \add the king’s\add* \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*, and it was \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w meet|strong="H0749"\w* for us to \w see|strong="H2370"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w dishonour|strong="H6173"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H5922"\w* have we \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* and \w certified|strong="H3046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*;\f + \fr 4.14 \ft we have…: Chaldee, we are salted with the salt of the palace\f*

That \w search|strong="H1240"\w* may be made in the \w book|strong="H5609"\w* of the \w records|strong="H1799"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w*: so shalt thou \w find|strong="H7912"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5609"\w* of the \w records|strong="H1799"\w*, and \w know|strong="H3046"\w* that \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \add is\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4779"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w*, and \w hurtful|strong="H5142"\w* unto \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* and \w provinces|strong="H4083"\w*, and that they have \w moved|strong="H5648"\w* \w sedition|strong="H0849"\w* within the \w same|strong="H1459"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w old|strong="H5957"\w* \w time|strong="H3118"\w*: \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w which|strong="H1836"\w* cause was \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2718"\w*. \f + \fr 4.15 \ft moved: Chaldee, made\f*\f + \fr 4.15 \ft within…: Chaldee, in the midst thereof\f*

\w We|strong="H0586"\w* \w certify|strong="H3046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* that, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* be \w builded|strong="H1124"\w* \add again\add*, and the \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* thereof set \w up|strong="H3635"\w*, by \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w means|strong="H6903"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H0383"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w portion|strong="H2508"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*.

¶ \add Then\add* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* an \w answer|strong="H6600"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w* the \w chancellor|strong="H1169"\w*, and \add to\add* \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, and \add to\add* the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* of their \w companions|strong="H3675"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3488"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8115"\w*, and \add unto\add* the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w Peace|strong="H8001"\w*, and at such a \w time|strong="H3706"\w*.\f + \fr 4.17 \ft companions: Chaldee, societies\f*
The \w letter|strong="H5407"\w* which ye \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* unto \w us|strong="H5922"\w* hath been \w plainly|strong="H6568"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* me.

And \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w commanded|strong="H7761"\w*, and \w search|strong="H1240"\w* hath been made, and it is \w found|strong="H7912"\w* that \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w old|strong="H5957"\w* \w time|strong="H3118"\w* hath made \w insurrection|strong="H5376"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*, and \add that\add* \w rebellion|strong="H4776"\w* and \w sedition|strong="H0849"\w* have been \w made|strong="H5648"\w* therein.\f + \fr 4.19 \ft I commanded: Chaldee, by me a decree is set\f*\f + \fr 4.19 \ft made insurrection: Chaldee, lifted up itself\f*

There have \w been|strong="H1934"\w* \w mighty|strong="H8624"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* also \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, which have \w ruled|strong="H7990"\w* over \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \add countries\add* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*; and \w toll|strong="H4061"\w*, \w tribute|strong="H1093"\w*, and \w custom|strong="H1983"\w*, was \w paid|strong="H3052"\w* unto them.

\w Give|strong="H7761"\w* ye \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w commandment|strong="H2942"\w* to \w cause|strong="H0989"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* to \w cease|strong="H0989"\w*, and that \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* be \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w builded|strong="H1124"\w*, \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \add another\add* \w commandment|strong="H2941"\w* shall be \w given|strong="H7761"\w* from \w me|strong="H4481"\w*.\f + \fr 4.21 \ft Give…: Chaldee, Make a decree\f*

Take \w heed|strong="H1934"\w* now that ye \w fail|strong="H7960"\w* not to \w do|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w*: \w why|strong="H4101"\w* should \w damage|strong="H2257"\w* \w grow|strong="H7680"\w* to the \w hurt|strong="H5142"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*?

¶ \w Now|strong="H0116"\w* \w when|strong="H4481"\w* the \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* of \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Artaxerxes’|strong="H0783"\w* \w letter|strong="H5407"\w* \add was\add* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w*, and \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, and their \w companions|strong="H3675"\w*, they went \w up|strong="H0236"\w* in \w haste|strong="H0924"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, and made \w them|strong="H1994"\w* to \w cease|strong="H0989"\w* by \w force|strong="H0153"\w* and \w power|strong="H2429"\w*.\f + \fr 4.23 \ft by force…: Chaldee, by arm and power\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w ceased|strong="H0989"\w* the \w work|strong="H5673"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add is\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. So it \w ceased|strong="H1934"\w* \w unto|strong="H5705"\w* the \w second|strong="H8648"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6540"\w*.
